My INFT3102 Assignment

How to Run This Application

  1. Open a Terminal

    If using VSCode, open a new terminal by navigating to Terminal > New Terminal.

  2. Navigate to the Project Directory

    Ensure the terminal is in the correct project directory (e.g., C:\Users\Moham\OneDrive\Desktop\WD\Demo11ty).

    • If not, use the command: 
      cd <Your Directory>
  3. Start the Development Server

    Run the following command in the terminal to start the Eleventy server:

    npx @11ty/eleventy --serve

Maintaining the Eleventy/Handlebars Project

To ensure smooth operation, follow these best practices:

  • Organize Files:
    • All relevant files are located in the src directory and should not be removed.
    • The dist folder is automatically generated with each build and can be safely deleted if needed.
    • Edit eleventy.config.js to customize configurations.
  • Update Dependencies:
    • Check for outdated packages with: 
      npm outdated
    • Update dependencies using: 
      npm update
  • Run Locally for Development:

    Use the following command to test changes live:

    npx @11ty/eleventy --serve

Reflection

The project structure and workflow with Handlebars are similar to working with Nunjucks (njk). However, Handlebars' syntax presented challenges, particularly with pagination, due to its lack of built-in looping constructs like for or while loops.
